data.lyric:
[ti:Over It (Explicit)]
[ar:Summer Walker]
[al:Over It (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Over It (Explicit) - Summer Walker
[00:05.20]Lyrics by：Summer Walker/Aubrey Robinson/Kendall Roark Bailey/London Holmes/C. McGill/A. Tjernagel/K. Hutton
[00:10.40]Composed by：Summer Walker/Aubrey Robinson/Kendall Roark Bailey/London Holmes/C. McGill/A. Tjernagel/K. Hutton
[00:15.60]Am I really that much to handle
[00:19.52]Breakin' these n***as down like enamel oh
[00:22.93]Yet I'm ready to blow you out like a candle
[00:26.59]Can I really just blow you out like a candle
[00:29.93]You a man you say you the man oh
[00:33.58]You say you 'bout it you say you got it planned oh
[00:36.75]I really wasn't tryna listen
[00:38.48]You say I ain't got no discipline oh
[00:42.39]And that there why I wasn't listenin' oh
[00:44.57]But I need a n***a who can handle me oh
[00:48.70]I want a a n***a who can handle me oh
[00:53.11]N***a keep your hands off me
[00:55.57]You wanna stay with me
[00:56.62]But n***a you just a fan of me fan of me
[00:59.99]Cuff your b***h n***a
[01:01.25]N***a cuff your b***h
[01:03.51]Caught you slippin' and a n***a hit a lick
[01:06.25]Are you really tellin' me that
[01:10.41]I could break you down like a gym sweat
[01:14.96]F**k it and catch me at V-live
[01:17.69]I'll be sippin' D'usse 'til I dizzy
[01:21.51]Actin' like he care he just don't decide
[01:24.01]I be tryna numb the pain I be so hizzigh oh
[01:28.82]F**k it you can catch me in the hills oh
[01:32.33]Watch me close 'cause I'll be poppin' pills oh oh
[01:36.07]All I ask for you to keep it trill oh
[01:39.68]All I ask for you to keep it real real
[01:42.31]Real real real
[01:43.94]Oh oh oh oh oh
[01:46.91]Real real trill keep one hunnid oh no
[01:50.44]Not too much emotion no no
[01:53.91]You know I been f**ked up yeah yeah
[01:57.73]I should keep it trill trill for me
[02:01.47]I should keep it real real one hunnid
data.trans:
[ti:Over It (Explicit)]
[ar:Summer Walker]
[al:Over It (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:05.20]//
[00:10.40]//
[00:15.60]我真的有那么难对付吗
[00:19.52]把这些家伙打得落花流水
[00:22.93]可我准备像蜡烛一样将你消灭
[00:26.59]我真的可以像蜡烛一样将你熄灭吗
[00:29.93]你是个顶天立地的男子汉
[00:33.58]你说你准备好了你说计划好了
[00:36.75]我真的不想听
[00:38.48]你说我没有纪律
[00:42.39]这就是我不愿侧耳倾听的原因
[00:44.57]但我需要一个能搞定我的男人
[00:48.70]我想要一个能搞定我的男人
[00:53.11]哥们离我远点
[00:55.57]你想留在我身边
[00:56.62]但是兄弟你只是我的粉丝
[00:59.99]把你的女人铐起来兄弟
[01:01.25]兄弟把你的女人铐起来
[01:03.51]//
[01:06.25]你真的是在跟我说这些吗
[01:10.41]我可以让你痛苦不堪就像让你汗流浃背
[01:14.96]去他的在V-live找我吧
[01:17.69]我会啜饮美酒直到我头晕目眩
[01:21.51]他装作很在乎的样子可他犹豫不决
[01:24.01]我试图麻痹痛苦我嗨翻天
[01:28.82]去他的你可以在山里找到我
[01:32.33]看着我靠近一点因为我会吞下药片
[01:36.07]我对你的要求就是让你的音乐充满活力
[01:39.68]我只求你真诚相待
[01:42.31]真的
[01:43.94]//
[01:46.91]真正的颤栗保持一颗百元大钞
[01:50.44]不要有太多情绪
[01:53.91]你知道我很悲惨
[01:57.73]我应该为自己留着颤音
[02:01.47]我应该实话实说
